legal_basis: Rule 372 of the Federal Court Rules
Section 22 of the Crown Liability and Proceedings Act
application_details: Applicants, previous license holders, sought urgent interim relief due to delayed decisions on their permits.
decision_reasoning: The court cannot dictate the Minister's discretionary decision-making.
cause_of_action: Delay in issuing snow crab fishing permits without explanation from Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
procedure_followed: Applicants filed motions under Federal Court Rules seeking interim injunctions to compel the issuance of fishing licenses.
